full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender for AHU Speed Drive – J.A.G. Building PE
#### Reference Number: WS4411080061-Doc4451704556
#### Amendment Number: 4
#### Solicitation Number: WS4411080061

**Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the procurement of an Air Handling Unit (AHU) Speed Drive for the J.A.G. Building in Prince Edward Island.**

**Background and Context**
PWGSC is seeking a contractor to provide an AHU speed drive for the J.A.G. Building, as part of a construction project. The scope of work will include the procurement and installation of the necessary equipment.

**The Tender**
PWGSC invites qualified contractors to submit a bid for the AHU speed drive. The tender includes the following requirements:

* HVAC ventilation and duct work construction service (UNSPSC code: 72151204)
* Procurement category: CNST (Construction)

**Bidder Qualification**
Bidders must demonstrate their ability to provide the required services and meet the selection criteria.

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**

* Lowest Price

**Additional Information**

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of opportunity: Prince Edward Island
* Contracting Entity: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Contact Information:
  * Name: Timothee Beausoleil
  * Email: [timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothee.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  * Phone: (Please contact via email)

**Timeline**
* Publication Date: February 20, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 25, 2024 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

The PWGSC encourages all qualified contractors to participate in this tender opportunity. The complete details of the tender can be accessed on the supplied URL or through official public tenders websites.
